ServiceWorkerContainerReady.summary:
The ready read-only property of
the interface provides a way of delaying code
execution until a service worker is active. It returns a that
will never reject, and which waits indefinitely until
the associated with the current page has
an worker. Once that
condition is met, it resolves with
the .
ServiceWorkerContainerReady.value:
A that will never reject, and which may eventually resolve with a
.
